featured.text: Depending on your pet’s mood, the picture will capture an interested, curious expression or possibly a look of annoyance, especially if you’ve awakened it from a nap.

other.text: Researchers at Vanderbilt University are particularly interested in zebrafish retina regeneration.

definition.zh_def: 對某事物感到好奇或想了解的狀態。
definition.en_def: Having a desire to know or learn about something.
definition.example: She is interested in learning new languages.
